ygData.subject: Re: About cancel magic
ygData.msgSnippet: I also am not too sure what the function of Cancel Magic is... I believe it can undo roots but that seems to be about it.... Yesterday a druid friend and I
ygData.messageBody:
I also am not too sure what the function of Cancel Magic is... I believe it
can undo roots but that seems to be about it....
Yesterday a druid friend and I were grouped fighting evil eyes. He was
charmed and I finished the eye. Even after the eye died, my friend was
still charmed and continued to attack me. I then rooted him(we play on
Rallos Zek), he clicked all of his buffs off(which can still be done when
you are charmed), then cast cancel magic on him. It said that he felt a bit
dispelled yet it did not cancel the charm. Does cancel magic only give you
a chance to cancel the charm? I thought that canceling charm would have
been one of the main purposes of this spell. Also we tested cancel magic by
him casting stinging swarm(DOT) on me and me canceling. It seems to work
sometimes, but not always... it may have something to do with being grouped
or not... Does anyone have any data on how this spell works and when it
will work? Also should cancel magic work against Necro DOT's?

Thanks,

Euros


From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>

Do cancel magic take away Debuffs before buffs? or does it take away the
buff upper.
If I have these shields:
Lesser shielding
Resistant skin
See invisible
Drowsy

Whould it take away Lesser shielding couse it is the first or does it take
away drowsy first becouse drowsy is a debuff?

Hope you understand my question
